document.text:
From: 
To:' 
Subject: 7/15 status report a 
Date: Thu, 18 Jul 2019 02:30:33 +0000 
Because the unredacted search warrant materials and July 15 status report will be filed at 11 and the 
Epstein bail hearing is at 11:30, a couple of reporters have asked if I can tell them how many pages the status 
report is, so they have a sense of how much they'll have to read between 11 and 11:30 if they're covering both. 
EFTA00022524
